channel.title: Charles Palmer
channel.description: I like learning, teaching, and exploring technology that enables those things.

item.title: Building This Site Part 1.5: You ARE a Web Designer!
item.dc:creator: Charles Palmer
item.description: In the last post I established a handful of things to consider in setting up a “blogfoliosume” (I should copyright that…) and promised a few more articles digging into the details. But before we go there it occurs to me that I should outline a few key parts of web design first, and hopefully dispel […]
item.content:encoded:
In the last post I established a handful of things to consider in setting up a “blogfoliosume” (I should copyright that…) and promised a few more articles digging into the details. But before we go there it occurs to me that I should outline a few key parts of web design first, and hopefully dispel any trepidation you might feel on the more complex paths I’ll explore. My primary audience here…

Source

item.title: Building This Site Part 1: Overview
item.dc:creator: Charles Palmer
item.description: Over the next few posts I’ll walk through the decisions to make when building your own site of this type (the blogfoliosume). Personally I lean towards the more technical and involved approach, but I will try and provide options along the way along with the pros and cons of each decision (i.e. the easy option […]
item.content:encoded:
Over the next few posts I’ll walk through the decisions to make when building your own site of this type (the blogfoliosume). Personally I lean towards the more technical and involved approach, but I will try and provide options along the way along with the pros and cons of each decision (i.e. the easy option vs the cheap option vs the flexible option, rarely can you get all 3). Let’s begin!

Source

item.title: Hello World!
item.dc:creator: Charles Palmer
item.description: Hello and welcome! I’m Charles Palmer and this is my blog/portfolio/resume, or “blogfoliosume”. I am an adult education (andragogy) professional with over 15 years experience in Learning and Development. My specialty is learning technology, specifically finding new ways to integrate emerging technologies into learning experiences. Over the past 15 years I have established myself as […]
item.content:encoded:
Hello and welcome! I’m Charles Palmer and this is my blog/portfolio/resume, or “blogfoliosume”. I am an adult education (andragogy) professional with over 15 years experience in Learning and Development. My specialty is learning technology, specifically finding new ways to integrate emerging technologies into learning experiences. Over the past 15 years I have established myself as an expert…
